name: Dear John (Givit Game Studios)
description:
Dear John is a isometric point and click adventure game where you need find out the truth about Edith. Edith is a young women your father met on social media. With a dynamic weather system and isometric view this is a experience that you don't want to miss out on.

REMEMBER TO READ YOUR DIARY

Please note the animations are a bit buggy. I will fix it later.

Controls

Only need your mouse to play the game.
